examples: I gathered a basket of sloes from the bushes near my house.

examples: My friend prefers a vegetarian sandwich with avocado and sprouts.

examples: You can’t really attach a label to this type of art.

examples: The unexpected challenges became grist for the mill of their problem-solving skills.

examples: The striped socks matched perfectly with his striped shirt.
